title: Ring in the new year with both Microsoft Office Pro and Windows 11 Pro for under $50
content:
Macworld

If you’re getting a PC this holiday season, giving one, or need to give one an entirely fresh start, then this package is for you. 

Give any PC a boost with the All-in-One Microsoft Bundle, which gives you lifetime access to Microsoft Office Pro 2019 for Windows and Windows 11 Pro. Through December 3, score Cyber Week pricing on this Microsoft powerhouse bundle, only $49.97 (reg. $408)!

With MS Office Pro, you’ll get the 2019 version of Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, OneNote, Publisher, and Access for life. While you can only install these productivity apps on one PC, there aren’t any subscription fees or recurring costs, like what you’d find with Microsoft 365.

Want an enhanced user experience? Upgrading your OS could be the answer, and it’s easy with Windows 11 Pro. Enjoy an intuitive interface customizable with widgets, snap layouts, and advanced security features, including:

  • Wake and Lock
  • Smart app control
  • Biometrics login
  • Bitlocker Device Encryption
  • And much more.

Don’t miss this Cyber Week deal that nets you (or a loved one!) Microsoft’s top-rated OS and productivity suite for less!

Through December 3 at 11:59 p.m. Pacific, grab lifetime access to Microsoft Office Pro 2019 for Windows and Windows 11 Pro for just $49.97. No coupon required!
